title: Karas Corner Of Doom
content:

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:text-style]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:night-rush-theme]]


[[module CSS]]
/* HEADER */
 #header h1 a, #header h2 span{
     color: transparent;
     text-shadow: none;
}
 #header h1 a::before {
     content: "Kara’s Corner of Doom";
}
 #header h2 span::before {
     content: "So this is the reason we can’t have nice things...";
}
 #page-title{ display: none; }


div#extra-div-1 {
    height: 140px;
    width: 100%;
    top: 0;
    position: absolute;
    background: urlhttps://i.imgur.com/NrpvGZl.png;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: 50% 50%;
[[/module]]

----
[[size 150%]]On the Subject Of the Kara[[/size]] 
----
[[include component:image-block
|name=https://i.imgur.com/QgeEszY.png
|width=300px
|caption=--A drawing of the Kara-- I hate drawing myself. It's annoying and it takes 70 years.
]]

What do Karas do? We’re very unsure.

We know that xe enjoys art, music, and occasionally fire. Possibly avian in nature? Though, xe has shown signs of being a cat, and a bird, also strangely a monkey? Its assumed xe is a harpy. Probably a shapeshifter as well. --Contain at all costs.-- To never be contained. 

----
[[size 150%]]The Personnel File[[/size]]
----
Hello Hello!

I’m Kara! 

No, no. Sit down, and shut up. Leaving is illegal, and there will be --lethal-- appropriate force taken to ensure you stay in this room.

So, about me…

* My pronouns are they/they,
 * I'm genderfluid, non-binary, pansexual, asexual, polyamorous, and over all just very very queer
* I am in love with my fiancé [[*user Marceline_Raynes]]
 * and I love our two beautiful baby boys
* I really love Pokemon and Metroid (The Prime Trilogy is my absolute favorite)
* I love Corgis
* I'm a music nerd
 * I play the bassoon (8 years), piano (13 years (no I'm not good)), and synth (4 years)
 * I'm going to college to get a bachelors in Audio Production and hopefully a masters (in the future) in Bassoon Performance
* I like bullet lists
* I'm mostly a friendly face around :)
* I'm not so much apart of the wiki, but I needed to edit and remove some things from this bullet list. 
 * Don't ask me to crit/help/coauthor anything. It will not happen

----
[[size 150%]]People I Love A LOT[[/size]]
----

“That's it?” 

Don’t like it? Wait a month or five, there might be more! Or not, I don’t know…

In the time between, go read some of these wonderful peoples’ work! They're really cool and I've know them for a while and they're my friends :)

(those with ! in their names are my besties, we love them here)

[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/floppyphoenix Lt Flops]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/notgull Notgull]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/he-who-cannot-stop-stealing Naepic]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/marcelles-raynes-author-page Mars!]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/doctor-fullham Doctor Fullham!]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/fairydoctor-folio Fairydoctor!]
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/oboebandgeek99 Oboebandgeek99]
Athenodora!
Tawnyowljones!

----

Wait, one more thing!

> If life happens, and I decide to leave the site, I die, or I otherwise don't exist for 4 years, without anyone knowing about my whereabouts and having the ability to contact me, then I wish for [[*user Marceline_Raynes]] to take ownership of all of my articles (aside from collaborations, which go to their co-authors), and all matters of deletion, porting and licensing are to be forwarded to him.

> The Team Bird Art Page is a special case and should be handled by the Team Bird Team ([[*user notgull]], [[*user Lt Flops]], [[*user Ayers]], and [[*user Quantum Physician]]) They’re great people and I have trust in them (Maybe too much.)


----
That's it. Go home, you can not stay here!
author: The_Spider_Queen
